mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, Robert, 1816-1877
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Understands from the Ledger that Mr. Lane is opposed to the Pacific Railroad project; regrets that he does not give his "able support" to the project; claims that Lane is wrong in attributing the project to New York speculators who intend to make the road a private corporation. Autograph Letter Signed Includes Typewritten Copy of the above Autograph Letter Signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1853 September 30, Robert Tyler to Washington Lane, Editor of the Ledger
